about_the_game:
"Shooting them, despite their cuteness, is the only option..."
- Veteran soldier of the First War for Reclamation

Take on hordes of killer mutant squirrels and deranged AI androids in my crazy action arcade shooter.

Experience the Wrath of Ratatosk and manage mutations and zone threat levels through offering 'tithings' to the squirrel god.

Level up weapons, mod your suit, train your soldiers and have chef prepare a variety of meals to boost your stats before your next mission.

Continually updated since launch, Squirrelmageddon! has been patched with many new features and a ton of improvements / fixes. I usually push 1-2 updates per month.

Gameplay & Features

  • Killing mutant squirrels attracts larger squirrels... some of them explode... of course...
  • Mission system with objectives
  • 3rd / 1st person camera toggle hotkey
  • TPS + ADS Option
  • WRATH SYSTEM: failure results in squirrel mutations
  • Cooking, Crafting, Praying and Final Meal systems
  • KAWAII-AR4000 chipset to render squirrel cuteness
  • Glider movement as an arcade gameplay mechanic
  • Persistent moveable barricades, crates and other objects
  • Soldier mission log replay system. (Squirrel mission replays ASAP!)
  • High Score Leaderboards
  • Virus Infected AI enemies with varying weapon types
  • A whole lotta flesh eating mutant squirrels!

THE WEAPONS

  • 18 Weapons
  • Grenades and proximity mines
  • Moveable Turrets (single player)
  • TPS / FPS / ADS hybrid shooter
  • Weapon Proficiency training
  • Weapon levels affect clip size, reload speed, and damage.

"Worship the squirrel... feel it's power!"
- Brethren cult member

HEALTH & WARNINGS

  • Playing this game may induce Sciurophobia in some players.
  • Playing this game may cure Sciurophobia in some players.
  • Playing this game does not mean you are psychotic - I asked.
  • Spending years making this game does mean I'm clinically repressed - I asked.

"I dine only upon the finest squirrel bits..."
- Elite hiver

The Hive is starving! FEED THE HIVE!!

Your support for the world of Squirrelmageddon! and all it's madness is much appreciated! It's good to know "I'm not the only one!" - lol

Thank you for playing!
谢谢你玩我的游戏！

content_descriptors.notes: Graphic violence of Humans against Squirrels.  Graphic violence of Squirrels against Humans.  We do not condone or support real world harming of squirrels nor wildlife of any kind.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® 5th Generation - i3-5010U or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1065 / AMD RX580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hosting multiplayer will require a decent rig
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® 6th Generation - i5 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 / AMD Radeon VII or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hosting multiplayer will require a decent rig

short_description: Rough day at work? Sick of the B.S.? Need to escape and vent some rage? Me too! Face hordes of my psychopathic mutant killer squirrels and deranged infected androids in this scrappy horde action shooter... You will laugh, you will cry, you will die by the squirrel! Regular updates since 2021!
